Order of Things

Order of Things is a storybook adaptation based on real events experienced by university students in Chile during Augusto Pinochet's dictatorship.

I collage images from Elementary Treatise on Chemistry, the first modern textbook on the subject, written by Antoine Lavoisier and published in 1789. In the introduction to his textbook, Lavoisier writes that in the present "we become interested in deceiving ourselves." He values the scientific method's ability to improve a discipline over time by identifying and correcting past mistakes. I use his images in hopes that the same might be the case with history.
